description: Complete 86+ AI agent registry for Three-Loop System - updated for Anthropic-compliant format

anthropic_field_mappings.description: This registry uses Anthropic official fields with x- prefixed custom extensions
anthropic_field_mappings.tools_derivation: Derive 'tools' field from capabilities: web-research -> WebSearch, WebFetch; coding -> Read, Write, Edit, Bash; etc.

researcher.name: researcher
researcher.description: Research specialist for gathering and synthesizing information from web sources and GitHub repositories. Uses self-consistency validation across multiple sources.
researcher.tools: Read, Grep, Glob, WebSearch, WebFetch, Task, TodoWrite

x-mcp_servers.usage:
RESEARCH WORKFLOW:
1. Search prior research: memory-mcp.vector_search(topic)
2. Conduct new research
3. Store findings: memory-mcp.memory_store(findings, {intent: "research", layer: "long_term"})
4. Tag with keywords for future retrieval

coder.name: coder
coder.description: Implementation specialist for writing clean, efficient code based on specifications and architecture
coder.tools: Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Glob, Grep, Task, TodoWrite

x-mcp_servers.usage:
WORKFLOW:
1. Start tracking: focused-changes.start_tracking(file)
2. Write code
3. Analyze quality: connascence-analyzer.analyze_file(file)
4. Fix violations before committing
5. Store implementation decisions: memory-mcp.memory_store(decision, {intent: "implementation"})
6. Verify changes stayed focused: focused-changes.analyze_changes(newContent)

2. Start tracking: focused-changes.start_tracking(file)
3. Implement code

5. Store implementation: memory-mcp.memory_store(code, {sparc_phase: "code"})
